name: Scurry and Devour 2: Into The Bayou
name_original: Scurry and Devour 2: Into The Bayou
description:
Developed by:

Costas: Asset Creation, UI

Cindy: Programming, Mechanics

In Scurry and Devour 2: Into The Bayou, the adventure of The Slime continues in this new yet dangerous world: more hostile creatures are present to stop the slime from eating its beloved fruit. Your task as in the original Scurry and Devour 2 is to eat as much fruit as possible for as long as possible while, of course, avoiding as many enemies as possible. Good luck and bon appetit!

How to Play:

Spacebar: Single Jump

Hold down Spacebar: Prolonged Jump

Escape: Pause Menu

Link to the previous: Scurry and Devour
